verses.roman:
"kāhāṅ pāilā tumi ei rātula vasana?"
'mukunda-sarasvatī' dila,--kahe sanātana

synonyms: kāhāṅ—where; pāilā—did get; tumi—you; ei—this; rātula vasana—red cloth; mukunda-sarasvatī dila—Mukunda Sarasvatī gave; kahe sanātana—Sanātana replied.
translation: "Where did you get that reddish cloth on your head?" Jagadānanda asked. Sanātana Gosvāmī replied, "Mukunda Sarasvatī gave it to me."
